title: Hoodies, to wear or not to wear?
body:
I don't like wearing hoodies most of the time unless its really really chilly or raining a bunch or I like to walk down the street thinking I am one of these dudes:

http://i644.photobucket.com/albums/uu163/Black-Jacker/KingdomHearts-OrganizationXIII.jpg
But other than that, I usually don't wear them because I think they look awful.

What about you guys?
